channel.title: Commands Do Not Work For Non-Staff

item.title: Commands Do Not Work For Non-Staff
item.dc:creator: @omg_ffs_ownd omg ffs ownd
item.description:
@omg_ffs_ownd wrote:

change

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 0) { addSkillXP(860082800, 0); addSkillXP(860082800, 2); addSkillXP(860082800, 3); addSkillXP(860082800, 4); addSkillXP(860082800, 6); sendMessage("You Are Now A Pure") }
to…

if (command.startsWith("pure") && playerRights >= 0) { addSkillXP(860082800, 0); addSkillXP(860082800, 2); addSkillXP(860082800, 3); addSkillXP(860082800, 4); addSkillXP(860082800, 6); sendMessage("You Are Now A Pure") }
that work?

Read full topic

item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

remove ur this

&& playerRights >= 0)

it become this

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 0) { addSkillXP(860082800, 0); addSkillXP(860082800, 2); addSkillXP(860082800, 3); addSkillXP(860082800, 4); addSkillXP(860082800, 6); sendMessage("You Are Now A Pure") }

item.title: Commands Do Not Work For Non-Staff
item.dc:creator: @iownhard56 iownhard56
item.description:
@iownhard56 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure")) { addSkillXP(860082800, 0); addSkillXP(860082800, 2); addSkillXP(860082800, 3); addSkillXP(860082800, 4); addSkillXP(860082800, 6); sendMessage("You Are Now A Pure") }

TRY GETTING RID OF THE BRAKET THING LIKE THIS

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”))
{ <---------
addSkillXP(860082800, 0);
addSkillXP(860082800, 2);
addSkillXP(860082800, 3);

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”))
<---------
addSkillXP(860082800, 0);
addSkillXP(860082800, 2);
addSkillXP(860082800, 3);
addSkillXP(860082800, 4);
addSkillXP(860082800, 6);
sendMessage(“You Are Now A Pure”)

item.title: Commands Do Not Work For Non-Staff
item.dc:creator: @Burkey Burkey
item.description:
@Burkey wrote:

Hello, It’s Burkey. I am working on the Pking Version of Exile Scape. I need to know something.

How do I fix my commands? The base source I am using, commands only work for mods/admins/owners etc.

Can some one tell me how to fix this. Here is an example of a command that will not work.if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 0) { addSkillXP(860082800, 0); addSkillXP(860082800, 2); addSkillXP(860082800, 3); addSkillXP(860082800, 4); addSkillXP(860082800, 6); sendMessage("You Are Now A Pure") }

Please Post On How To Fix This

Read full topic
